cross: Cattleya Lulu x Cattleya Penny Kuroda (Penny Kuroda Gp)

measurements.description: Twelve flowers clustered at the top of one very strong 26-cm inflorescence; sepals cream-white suffused rose pink, spotted dark pink, green distal tip; petals cream-white suffused dark pink, distal half spotted darker pink; lip cream-white, side lobes blushed pink, midlobe overlaid dark purple distally; column cream-white, blushed pink margins, anther cap cream-white, pink spot; substance firm; texture matte.
